name: Caption Writer for Instagram
description: If youve ever asked how to create spaces on Instagram, look no further.   Caption Writer for Instagram lets you:   - Create line breaks in Instagram captions and bios - Create and save groups of hashtags - Write captions, save drafts, insert spaces, add hashtags and open Instagram all from one easy-to-use app  Enjoy using Caption Writer to create spaces on Instagram? Spread the word!   Thanks!  Have questions? Want more? Wish it could do something it cant? Reach out at help@applight.io!
